properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.base-packages
properties.description: Packages that need to scan for aggregated annotations

properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.default-timeout
properties.description: Set a default timeout for the method of providing data

properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.ignore-exception
properties.description: Ignore exception thrown by asynchronous execution, method returns null value

properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.queue-size
properties.description: The size of the queue that holds the task to be executed

properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.thread-number
properties.description: Thread size of the asynchronous thread pool

properties.name: io.github.lvyahui8.spring.thread-prefix
properties.description: Thread name prefix for asynchronous threads
